title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 153.5 - Method of sampling and analysis
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 153.5 - Method of sampling and analysis

State Regulations

Any sampling and analysis as provided for by the law shall
be in accordance with methods of sampling and analysis generally accepted in
the scientific community. The methods of sampling and analysis set forth in the

Official Method of Analysis of the Association of Official Analytical Chemists, 11th Edition, 1970,[FN1] and as such methods may hereafter be revised, shall be
prima facie evidence of such generally accepted standards. [FN1] [Not filed with Department of

State.]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
153.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
